Package ua.java.conferences.utils

This is util package. It contains most util classes: Captcha - implements Google Recaptcha service check ConvertorUtil - converts DTO to Entity and vise versa EmailSender - to send emails PaginationUtil - to add required fields to request to implement pagination PasswordHashUtil - to encode and verify passwords PdfUtil - to create pdf docs QueryBuilderUtil - to obtain string for complex queries ValidatorUtil - to validate fields
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Captcha
    Validate Google ReCaptcha
    ConvertorUtil
    Converts DTO to Entities and vise versa
    EmailSender
    Send emails to Users
    PaginationUtil
    Configure request to set all required for page surfing attributes
    PasswordHashUtil
    Encode and verify encoded passwords.
    PdfUtil
    Create required pdf docs with itext pdf library
    QueryBuilderUtil
    Factory to return concrete query builders
    ValidatorUtil
